data.title: The complete Rankin/Bass Christmas collection
data.text:
Title from container.

"Includes 18 holiday favorites."--cover.

Special features: The animagic world of Rankin/Bass; Restoring the puppets of Rudolph; Reimagining Rudolph in 4D; Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer attraction film; T.E.A.M Rudolph and the Reindeer Games; Original pencil test; Commentary by animation historian Mark Evanier (Frosty the Snowman); Commentary with animation historian Greg Ehrbar (Santa Claus is comin' to town); Christmas: a global holiday; We are Santa's elves; Stop motion 101; Frosty and the story of the snowman.

English audio; optional English SDH. Spanish and French audio and subtitles are available on some discs.

Disc 1. Rudolph the red nosed reindeer (1964 ; 53 min.)

Disc 2. Santa Claus is comin' to town (1970 ; 51 min.)

Disc. 3 The year without a Santa Claus (1974 ; 50 min.) ; Nestor, the long-eared Christmas donkey (1977 ; 25 min) ; Rudolph's shiny New Year (1976 ; 50 min.)

Disc 4. Frosty the Snowman (1969 ; 26 min.)

Disc 5. Frosty's winter wonderland (1976 ; 24 min.) ; 'Twas the night before Christmas (1974 ; 24 min.)

Disc 6. The little drummer boy (1968 ; 25 min.) ; Cricket on the hearth (1967 ; 49 min.)

Disc 7. The little drummer boy, book II (1976 ; 24 min.) ; The stingiest man in town (1978 ; 50 min.) ; Pinocchio's Christmas (1980 ; 49 min.) ; The leprechaun's Christmas gold (1981 ; 25 min.)

Disc 8. Jack Frost (1979 ; 49 min.) ; The life and adventures of Santa Claus (1985 ; 49 min.) ; The first Christmas (1975 ; 24 min.)

Disc 9. Rudolph & Frosty's Christmas in July (1979 ; 90 min.).
